rules.description: (ti-vim 1) {vim-key} -> on, {vim-key}, esc, control+[ or any pointing_button -> off

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "to lower case"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "to upper case"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "add new line to the end of clipboard"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "duplicate line down"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "duplicate line up"'
